name: Disaster Recovery for Mission-Critical Apps
desc: Develop a disaster recovery strategy for high availability and failover capabilities. Designed a hybrid cloud solution between AWS and Azure to provide failover for mission-critical applications. Automated recovery processes reduced failover time by 70%, achieving a 99.9% uptime SLA.

name: Kubernetes Cluster Autoscaling with Karpenter
desc: Implement dynamic scaling of Kubernetes clusters using Karpenter to optimize resource usage and costs. Integrated Karpenter for cluster autoscaling, enabling efficient use of Spot Instances and on-demand scaling. Configured policies for CPU, memory, and GPU workloads to handle traffic spikes with minimal cost overhead.

name: GitOps Workflow with ArgoCD and Helm
desc: Set up a GitOps-based deployment pipeline to ensure version-controlled, automated Kubernetes deployments. Implemented a GitOps workflow using ArgoCD to sync application manifests stored in Git with Kubernetes clusters. Managed configurations with Helm Charts and improved deployment speed and reliability.
